feed.title: Gaseous Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Resolves bugs when importing Signatures by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/482
  • Note: This build will reimport all DATs if present on disk in order to fill in gaps in the database. This process may take some time to complete.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.8...v1.7.9

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix bug in docker healthcheck by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/484
  • Fixed issue with reading ROM DAT attributes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/485

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.9...v1.7.10

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Ignore and remove files that have unknown extensions by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/509
  • Minor bug fix for library scan filtering by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.10...v1.7.11

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.12
entry.content:
This release implements some IGDB API changes that are coming up (expected to be done by August).

It is highly recommended that users update to this version before August 2025

What's Changed

What's New

  • IGDB API Changes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/553
  • Note: this change will require a metadata refresh to restore some metadata

Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fixes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/554

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.11...v1.7.12-preview.2

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Resolve bug where titles that only exist in NoIntro aren't imported correctly by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/559

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.12...v1.7.13
